channel.title: Dates & News

item.description: FAQs Can you offer scholarships to cover costs of living (housing etc.)? While we can offer the program free of tuition, we unfortunately cannot offer any scholarships for such costs. Some external agencies, possibly in your home country, may be able to assist. There regularly are opportunities for paid positions as student research assistants, which helps cover parts of the cost of living. Can you help me with finding accommodation?

Program Structure 4 ME8: Master Thesis 30 ECTS 3 ME4: Time Series Analysis 10 ECTS ME6: Applied Econometrics 11 - 26 ECTS ME5: Economics 11 - 26 ECTS 2 ME2: Econometrics 9 ECTS ME6: Applied Econometrics ME7: Econometric Methods ME3: Case Studies 8 ECTS 1 ME1:
